homePageConstants.findTrustedProfessionals: Find Trusted Professionals for Any Home Project
homePageConstants.projectDescription: Describe your project in a few steps and get offers from qualified professionals in your area. It's completely free and non-binding.
homePageConstants.heroSectionMenImageAlt: Professional contractor working on home project
homePageConstants.describeYourProjectDescription: Tell us what you need help with - from carpentry to cleaning, renovations, repairs, and more.
homePageConstants.getOffersFromProfessionalsDescription: Qualified and verified businesses will review your project and send you offers.
homePageConstants.chooseTheRightProfessionalDescription: Compare price, ratings, and experience. Chat directly and hire the one that fits your needs.
homePageConstants.whatDoYouNeedForYourHelp: What do you need for your help?
homePageConstants.popularServicesDescription: Are you going to get started on a big project or a small mission? Post the project and get offers from relevant companies and craftsmen - or use the search feature to find the right business for you!
homePageConstants.findTheRightBusinessForYourProject: Find the right business for your project!
homePageConstants.whyUseOurPlatformMenImageLeftShapeAlt: Decorative shape element on the left
homePageConstants.whyUseOurPlatformMenImageRightShapeAlt: Decorative shape element on the right
homePageConstants.whatCustomersSayDescription: Are you going to get started on a big project or a small mission? Post the project and get offers from relevant companies and craftsmen - or use the search feature to find the right business for you!
homePageConstants.professionalBannerDescription: Offer your services, apply for relevant projects, and grow your business with qualified leads.
